name: Plus (WebGL)
description:
Play in Fullscreen for best results.

If the game starts with no volume, try to switch off the window and back on.

(Windows: Alt+Tab Twice)

(Mac: Command+Tab Twice)

Main Download: https://henmin.itch.io/plus

---

Plus is a Puzzle-Platformer where your character is constantly changing forms. Be large to clear far gaps, or be small to fit into tight places.

Message me on Discord about anything - Henmin#1980

Music by Eswyn - https://soundcloud.com/eswyn

---

Controls:

A - D : left & right

Left - Right Arrows : Rotate character (Alt J - L)

Up - Down Arrows : Hold to lock Rotation (Alt I - K)

Space - Jump
